name: Auto Apply Coupon Code – Quick Apply WooCommerce Coupon code
author: msanjay23

sections.description:
The plugin allows to auto apply coupon code from link.

It generate url from backend coupon code details page you can copy from their.

If already coupon code applied into cart and coupon code is different from url then it show popup which coupon code give best discount.

For existing coupon code and url coupon code same then it does not show popup for better discount.
sections.installation:
Just use the WordPress installer or upload to the /wp-content/plugins folder. Then Activate the Auto Apply Coupon plugin.

Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.6.1 or greater
  • WooCommerce 3.0.0 or greater
  • PHP version 7.4.0 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.6 or greater
